DOC.brief_summary: Chronic Bronchiolitis Resistant Asthma ? Testing way diagnosis treatment
DOC.criteria: Difficult asthma Patients potential allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis i.e . peripheral blood eosinophilia , sputum eosinophilia , sputum production bronchiectasis A history smoking Significant occupational environmental exposure Evidence emphysema chest high resolution compute tomography ( HRCT ) scan
